name: I'll Leave this blank till the day i find a name for this game
name_original: I'll Leave this blank till the day i find a name for this game
description:
This is a prototype of the game, It's a puzzle game that includes hacking.

The game is glitchy,  but  still playable.

Reid Hoffman's — “If you are not embarrassed by your initial release , you've launched too late.” 

Use WASD to move the player.

Use Mouse to rotate the camera.

Press F to grab items.
